TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit KeyGestureConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 將 物件來回轉換成其他型別。

span.span: Converts a object to and from other types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別只會將轉換的執行個體來回。The class only converts an instance to and from a . 來回轉換輔助按鍵和索引鍵之間的分隔符號使用"+"字元。The converts to and from a using the "+" character as the delimiter between the modifier keys and the key. 例如，字串`Control+A`會轉換成具有屬性等於並屬性等於。For example, the string `Control+A` would be converted into a with a property equal to and property equal to .

public: KeyGestureConverter();

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
